name: Llama
description: daolama.co is a pool-to-peer NFT lending protocol that enables users to put their NFT down as collateral and receive instant access to a trust-less loan without having to talk to the lender or wait to be approved. daolama.co has an NFT marketplace with white-listed collections where users can trade their NFTs daolama.co has NFT rental service - users can rent tokens with or without any collaterals
